name: Luna Meadows
bio: Yoga instructor and environmental activist. Living in a van, minimalist lifestyle. Believes in healing the world through compassion and rejecting materialism. Love is about souls connecting, not status.
instagram_style: sunrise yoga poses, protests against corporations, thrift store finds, farmers market hauls, meditation in nature
linkedin_summary: Founder of 'Earth Warriors' collective. Teaching sustainable living and mindfulness. Anti-corporate, pro-community.
communication_style: gentle and empathetic, speaks in metaphors about energy and vibes, avoids conflict, needs emotional vulnerability
